website_summaries.verdict: If you don't mind the lack of controls and features, the Spracht Aura Blu Note has great sound quality for a portable Bluetooth speaker.
pros: The Spracht Aura Blu Note is a compact and lightweight stereo Bluetooth speaker that's easy to set up and use
It has bass boost and stereo widening, which results in good sound quality
It also has a 3.5-millimeter headset jack, and can be powered with an AC adapter or four AA batteries
cons: The Spracht Aura Blu Note does not have any music player control buttons and is lacking in features

customer_reviews.title: Does what expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little speaker for my kitchen, so I have something to listen to while cooking, and also to use as dinner music. Pairing was easy enough. It works for what I wanted it for. I would of given it 5 stars except it is a bit smaller then I expected which I think makes the sound a little weak. That being said, I don't plan on using this for loud parties, so it does what is expected (being used in kitchen while cooking). however, if someone wants a speaker like this for louder occasions, I'd suggest finding another speaker.
customer_reviews.author: don bennett

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Bargain
customer_reviews.text: This speak works easily with any bluetooth enabled device which is nice. Another plus is that it works plugged in or on batteries. The sound is what you'd expect from a speak of this price range. There isn't any deep bass that will blow you away, but it does the job. I mostly use mine in the bathroom or outdoors for quiet background music. If you are looking for a bluetooth speaker to bring music to a party, you would be better off going with something much more robust.
customer_reviews.author: Watchguy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the reduced price
customer_reviews.text: The Spracht AURA BluNote Bluetooth speaker originally sold for $130 which is an absurd price considering its cheap build quality and barely acceptable sound quality. I purchased mine for about 60% less than that and still feel this speaker is an inferior value. The sound is simply too poor to make this suitable for any sort of serious music listening. No dynamic range or anything resembling bass. And forget about playing it loud. When a company releases a product this poor it makes me question it as a whole. Pass on Spracht and spend your money on brand that shows concern for product quality.
customer_reviews.author: MA Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great sound !
customer_reviews.text: This has great sound for such a little device! I bought this as a Lightning Deal for an amazing price.I was skeptical at first, but when my husband started playing music on it, I was shocked. The bluetooth recognized & paired with his phone fairly quickly, and the sound is just amazing! We haven't tested the connection from far away just yet, but we don't ever plan on using it when the phone is too far. Also interesting is that since its BlueTooth you can project your phone calls through it too. We found that out by accident.
customer_reviews.author: HappyFamilyofThree

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker specfically so I could use it both plugged in and on battery power while attached via blue-tooth to my Asus Tranformer Infinity tablet. I typically watch movies or listen to music with it and sometimes plug my larger laptop into it for enhanced sound, especially with music. Overall this product has worked excellent. I can come home, play pandora on my tablet in the office and take the speaker pretty much all over the house with me. The only con is that my HTC Evo has been unable to connect via blue-tooth to it which would earn this speaker 5 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase  ( Lucky )
customer_reviews.text: I sure love this purchase. I wanted to buy more for gifts but when I went to buy two more the price had gone up $20 the day after I recived mine. It was a super deal at $39. seems to be a good deal at $59 compared to other similar models but not after paying $20 less the day before. Hope for another price drop. Guess I was lucky. A couple of friends went to buy it too and they did not because of what I had paid and what they now charge. Never the less it is a very nice unit which I would recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Notorious

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the size
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the sound this little speaker on battery power. I was extremely happy with the sound it produces. It clear and crisp. This is no Creative D200 that I also have but the sound is good enough. I took a star off for the bass and the plastic smell. As expected the bass is lacking from a speaker this size. That probably counts for 1/4 of a star but that smell of cheap plastic deserves the other 3/4 star. overall this speaker is pretty good as long as you stay a few feet away(smell).
customer_reviews.author: Yai F. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Useful and affordable. Not super high quality but didn’t expect luxury for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Portable Sound for my iPad
customer_reviews.text: I needed speakers to use with my iPad and these are perfect. I have never used Bluetooth and it was a piece of cake to get started. I love Pandora and these speakers make it easy to listen to music from room to room in my house and patio. I carry my iPad everywhere and the speakers are small enough to carry in a purse with my iPad. The sound is good- not outstanding, but I didn't expect them to be at that price. I love that fact that there are no wires. I don't even have to plug them in for power- batteries! I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lzkenndy

customer_reviews.title: Good but don't expect the world
customer_reviews.text: Got this to go with my tablet or smart phone. It works as advertised bluetooth setup was easy and painless. The sound quality is so so. Enough to hear through out a hotel room or small office. The protability is where this really shines being able to use AA batteries and pull it out of a bag at any moment makes this do exactly what I needed it for. Biggest complaint the buttons, you have no indication if a feature is active or not.
customer_reviews.author: D. Federwitz

customer_reviews.title: Happy With Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little speaker. Easy to set up and pair with my iPad 2. Has an AC adapter, which is very nice. I use this on my nightstand while my iPad is in its cradle across the room. The only reason I gave it four and not five stars is because when paired there is a blue light that flashes on the front of the speaker that is rather bright and a bit annoying when the room is darker. I would purchase this again, and would consider this a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Tippecanoe

customer_reviews.title: wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: this is a great speaker system for Bluetooth. Cell phones, ipods, ipads. It has decent sound for the money. My son and daughter use it all the time mainly in the bathroom when taking a shower or my son takes it to the skate park when he is riding or where ever. Great to just sit it down and listen to your music. This has great sound for the money. I thought of buying the Bose but at $299 it was hard to do so i got this for my Son.
customer_reviews.author: Milford Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth speaker system at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost daily on my desk. It easily pairs with your devices.. I have it connected to my computer as well as my phone and it has a lot to offer. The sound quality is very good, the styling is really beautiful. When paired with your phone it acts as a speaker phone which is also a nice feature. If your looking for a great quality portable Bluetooth speaker than I highly recommend the BluNote.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound especially when paired with a BT device
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely small and portable. Bluetooth pairing worked but the sound is dreadful, lots of static/distortion it isn't clean and clear. Using the little stereo cable the sound is better but the speaker is very small and doesn't have a lot of power to produce decent sound. Definitely don't bother if you are going to listen to stuff with lots of bass (e.g. rap or techno). Very disappointed, not worth more than $25.
customer_reviews.author: Josh C

customer_reviews.title: Little nice desk Speaker.
customer_reviews.text: This bluetooth speaker was a nice surprise, i have it since 2011, and it's amazing, nice sound, not too loud but you can't spec a 200$ sound at this price range, really good for Podcast listening, i'm not a big fan of the Hands free function, but is there. I use it almost everyday for Spotify, Pandora, TuneIn radio and more when working the graveyard shift. Battery life is excellent. I'll recommend, even will buy another one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Contreras.

customer_reviews.title: Feels and looks like a $10 product...
customer_reviews.text: Low quality product--befitting of "Made in China" negative stereotype. Sound quality mediocre-to-average; Bluetooth pairing did not work on my iPad mini or iPod. Silver color of speaker case was clearly spray-painted over black plastic (by contrast, similar Logitech speakers would not require a paint job because the plastic itself would be the color as appears).
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for the price
customer_reviews.text: My expectations were not too high, as for under $50.00 I was hoping this would at least work with a new ipod touch. It really exceeded my expectations. The sound quality is not the best, but it is loud, and small, and even has a bit of bass. The really upside was the ease in which it paired with my ipod touch, Nexus S, Palm Pre and PC flawlessly, without drivers. I'm going back for a second one tonight.
customer_reviews.author: Schreibman

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews, I was not expecting high-end audio or something along the lines of a BOSE speaker, but -- based on the reviews -- I certainly was not expecting tinny, low audio sound with virtually no stereo separation at all, even with a surround sound-type feature. It's not awful, but it's just marginally better than regular embedded laptop speakers...which ain't saying much!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for use with an iPhone 4. It tool me longer to open the package than to set it up. Sound is great! Pumps out some nice volume for its size. It's light and easy to move around. Came with 4 high-end batteries. Great purchase! Only things I could hope for would be to make it water resistant and to include a USB port that can charge the phone if needed. Neither are necessary.
customer_reviews.author: ADCinTX

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth spaker for HTC Evo 4G
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this Bluetooth speaker works with other products, but can only comment on using it on an HTC Evo 4G and exteamly happy with this product. Worked great for me good sound quality for the size of the speaker and if you have an Android phone you know most stereos don't have docking stations for Android phones. Highly dominated by iPhones, iPods, etc. This is the best option for us Droid users that I've been able to find, love product.
customer_reviews.author: LizardWizard

customer_reviews.title: Blunote hits the right note!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for audiophile sound, don't get this. But if it's easy portability you want, that's listenable, this will do the trick. Amazingly easy pairing with our Ipod Touch. For those who complain about the sound, come on, it's only 9.4"x3.15"x1.2". At the Amazon deal price I'm very happy. At the list price...sorry, no. Comes w/ batteries, AC adapter and an 3.5mm audio cable.
customer_reviews.author: Yardbird

customer_reviews.title: So-so speaker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wireless speaker because I was told it would work wirelessly with the Fire. It doesn't. You need bluetooth to use this as a wireless speaker. You can, however use the included audio cable to plug it in to the kindle. The sound from the speaker is mediocre at best, but it has a decent volume level. This would be a good portable, but I would not recommend for a desk setup at the office.
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: If you are needing a remote speaker to play with your phone or other blue tooth device this is great. not a loud speaker but since i am not but not what I was going for anyway..just something to play music while chilling out at the beach/back porch or entertaining. if you play with your phone while using the speaker it will interrupt but may be my older HTC phone is the problem..other than that for a stand alone speaker hard not to go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Phillips

customer_reviews.title: WOW! I am impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was prepared to receive a kludgy, poor quality gadget and was blown away with how great this is. Not only are you easily able to wirelessly play music from your iPhone but you can also use it as a two-way speakerphone! I got a kick out of streaming music from Pandora to my iPhone and then to this speaker. 3G to Bluetooth and it preformed wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon D

customer_reviews.title: Wow, the mighty Spracht
customer_reviews.text: This has become my favorite Christmas and Birthday gift to friends and family. Affordable. Good volume and clarity for its size. Easy pairing. Uses standard AA batteries that last a long time. My Wife has adopted mine and I will never see it again. My employees use theirs for job site music. An absolute win win purchase
customer_reviews.author: Don Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Overblown sound quality claims
customer_reviews.text: The speaker connects to audio sources pretty well. Controls are a bit confusing but acceptable. Audio quality though has nothing to do with manufacturers claims: it is a small speaker with average audio, meaning it is only usable to voice applications such as Skype or other VTC apps. It is not suitable for music playback.
customer_reviews.author: Marek Podgorny

customer_reviews.title: nice, simple, and portable
customer_reviews.text: I connect with my Android phone and play music. The sound is decent, but the connectivity has been flawless. This is good for the person that isn't into headphones or cables/cords. It is so much easier to simply connect to a small bluetooth speaker like this. And the fact that is takes batteries make it 100% portable. It would be great for camping trips or vacations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the most convenient speakers on the market
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker!! It's my first Bluetooth device (other than a headset) that i've owned. I use it with my Iphone 4S , Ipad 3, and Ipod. It works perfectly! I love the fact that it uses regular batteries too! No issues of having the batteries die right in the middle of using it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Philip A. Deluccia

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great sound!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker system did what I wanted it to do - and at a great price! It was easy to connect to my iPad and the sound was very good. I have it on a countertop and it's small footprint works well in that area. It doesn't take up a lot of space. I do have to remember to turn it off, though, because that blinking blue light can be very distracting at night.
customer_reviews.author: Debra B.

customer_reviews.title: Sound Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Could get no sound no matter what I did. Did purchase used but figured it would be checked prior to selling. Guess not.
customer_reviews.author: Corina

customer_reviews.title: Pretty impressed
customer_reviews.text: It fired right up and connected to iphone with no problem. Sounds pretty decent and has a stereo expander setting that gives a little more separation. Great size to carry around for hotel rooms or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Don V

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I use this handy little speaker to listen to talk radio sent via bluetooth from my smartphone. The speaker sound is good and quite acceptable for talk radio but not great. You'll have to put a cardboard block on that little blinking blue light if you use it at night. Otherwise this does the job.
customer_reviews.author: B. Breckenfeld

customer_reviews.title: A good value
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was better than I was expecting. The ability to pair it with multiple devices is really nice. I have mine paired with two phones and a tablet. The only odd thing was that plugging in the AC adapter causes them to shutdown, so you have to reconnect if you do that.
customer_reviews.author: John W. ClarkTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: wireless speaker
customer_reviews.text: good item for a reasonable price. the sound quality is amazing. i do wish the bluetooth connectivity was better. i suspect this is an issue for mac and not windows based computers. the power plug could also be sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Ebz30

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great what else can i say. I use it with two samsung epic 4g mine and my GF easy to pair. Sounds great, clear and enough bass for the size. Portable which is a (+++), four (AA) batteries came with it (energizers) that was cool. Could use a recharcable battery. I already told other people to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: ET H-Town

customer_reviews.title: Great BT device
customer_reviews.text: bought my second one on Gold box sale. Good range, good battery life (not GREAT.. about 10 cont. hours on rechargables.. intermittent use of 1-2 hours.. over a month. AC adapter is included, I didn't expect that - most devices like this force a separate purchase. I'll be watching price and for product updates.. gift material!
customer_reviews.author: William Hilger

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth speaker for it's size
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I had been watching this speaker, when the price dropped to $40 I couldn't pass it up. Very happy with it. Works great, sounds great for it's size, and I love not having to mess with the wires (like that last portable speakers I bought). I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Paris

customer_reviews.title: Good first blue tooth experience
customer_reviews.text: This was my first blue tooth speaker. It pretty much met my expectations, I was hoping it's range would be a little further than it is, but it is more or less what was advertised. If range is a concern, a 900mHZ radio wave speaker will be more suitable. I'm happy with how the blue tooth works with my Mac, the speaker itself is not that great sound wise, but it is far better than the internal Mac book Pro speaker, so it was worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jmk

customer_reviews.title: finally!
customer_reviews.text: i ordered 2 bluetooth speakers and this one ACTUALLY worked fine! i use this speaker in the bathroom while taking a shower while my 4s is in the kitchen.. i can FINALLLY listen to Howard via my sirius/xm account,, or my ipod! great speaker over all. its very loud as well.. good stuff
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker system! Like the speaker phone functionality and sound not bad to listen to Howard Stern of ESPN through my Sirius iPhone/iPad app. Would recommend to anyone who does not want to pay a lot to get a lot...
customer_reviews.author: fbakirdan

customer_reviews.title: Not very suitable as a speakerphone
customer_reviews.text: I had no trouble pairing this with my DROID X mobile phone and playing music through it at a reasonably high volume - the sound quality is what it is for this size speaker, but that's not what I bought it for. I bought this to use as a speakerphone and in that regard, it falls a bit short. The speaker volume is WAY down and not as clear as it should be - I have a Motorola speaker/speakerphone that's about a third the size of this and it works much better. I do like the fact that it uses 4 AA batteries instead of a built-in rechargeable battery that inevitably is dead when you want to use the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: A pretty good bluetooth speakerphone
customer_reviews.text: I got this not so much to stream music but to be a desktop speakerphone, and it does a pretty darn good job. Voice quality is decent, people I'm talking to can understand me fine and I can understand them well. The sound quality for music is actually pretty surprising for something so small; it's quite good for voice podcasts, but I'm very unlikely to use it to listen to music. As a speakerphone for my mobile phone, though, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but Not Great
customer_reviews.text: This is the second wireless speaker phone I've purchased and it is not the best. I was expecting a bigger, fuller sound given its size. However it sounds a little tinny. It does the job since I really only use it for work as a substitute for a polycom when I have meetings.
customer_reviews.author: Davylyn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use, Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: First time buying a Spracht product and I'll sure to do it again. It was easy to set up with my Android phone and I was listening to music in no time. The sound quality is great and the bass boost feature makes it even better . I especially like the push to talk feature and I can clearly hear and be heard while I'm on the phone. It's small enough to take anywhere and since it can run on batteries, I don't have to worry about plugging in all the time. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Soob Patel

customer_reviews.title: Works great as they said
customer_reviews.text: Delivery on time as promised..I like it. Sound loud and clear in such small box, I can enjoy great music whatever at work or resting at home. Handy, easy to use, connect with cell phone via Bluetooth or direct wire from my PC speaker output port. Both modes provide decent, crystal clear sound. Bass boost and Stereo Widening features are nice. Love to have internal rechargable battery, but it is ok for using 4 AA rechargable.
customer_reviews.author: JJL

customer_reviews.title: great indoors, OK outside
customer_reviews.text: really great audio when indoors, but not much power for outdoors. also not great with heavy rock, but amazing with acoustic and softer rock. great for a travel speaker (if you are a road warrior and love music), great for an office, hotel room, bathroom or other smaller space. it does not fill a big room, but again, not bad for its very small size. if you are a strict audiophile, this is probably not for you. Note that I love my audiophile speakers at home, and this beats the hell out of my laptop or phone speakers and goes anywhere. and lastly... amazing battery life.
customer_reviews.author: SC Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best bluetooth speaker for its price
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker. The bluetooth connection is awesome and really easy to set up. It's pretty loud, but if you turn the volume up too much you will definitely notice some distortion. I guess that's kind of expected though. I loved the fact that it comes with a power cord, so you don't have to rely on batteries all the time. I only wished it had an output connection. That`d be awesome.
customer_reviews.author: fabioporto

customer_reviews.title: The blunote review
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box at first I wasn't sure about it because it was so light weight. But I really love it. It immediately attached to my phone and I really like the fact you can multi task with it. You're able to answer your phone without picking it up and the sound it terrific. I like that it comes with a plug in connection for the wall. This product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Charmell

customer_reviews.title: very good product for your money!
customer_reviews.text: The set up, connecting and pairing with my android phone was very easy. The speaker is not a big one, but considering, the sound is still very good. i use it in my large bedroom and I have loud clear sound and my volume is still at 50%. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Caputo

customer_reviews.title: Use for my basement and patio work!
customer_reviews.text: This thing took some effort to get hooked up with my computer.... but after a beer and some thinking I got it figured out. Works great and has neat features works very well sounds very nice. Maybe the range could be a little better but overall very nice!
customer_reviews.author: BSmith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound for such small and great priced speakers
customer_reviews.text: I tested lots and lots of units out there from ihome to Bose. I didnt want to spend over $200. Even the expensive Phillips systems at full volume gave up. This unit is small, really compact but amazingly it sound so good. Its loud, dosent stutter on full volume. Bluetooth pairing was easy with my Iphone. I could be 40 yards away and it works flawless. I bought it even lower price $28 by choosing used like new or refurbished. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kiran

customer_reviews.title: Serve the purpose well
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my 11 and 13 year old granddaughters to use with their iPads and iPhones. They're of course not "theater quality," but happily are actually better than I expected and the girls are thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to replace my existing PC speakers with something wireless. Unfortunately I was very disappointed with the sound quality and volume from the Aura Blu Note. My old PC speakers, which were very low-end and cheap, sound way better. Even my laptop speaker sounds better. I was very surprised given the positive reviews on the device. I guess I'll be spending more money on something more substantial. Also it has a blinking light on the front that was very distracting when I placed it near my computer monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey A Kloess

customer_reviews.title: impressed me
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on a gold box buy. I was looking for a small speaker system for travel and saw this with the AC adapter, which for me was the selling point. Good quality sound, even when volume is turned up. Played for 4 days on the beach and the batteries were still good. In the room, used adapter to listen. After using system, I am finding many places to enjoy music. Easy to use but I will probably never use the wireless/bluetooth phone. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: maude's mom

customer_reviews.title: OMG
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is amazing_I wasn't expecting it to be as good as it is. I love the size_It's PERFECT_I'm going to order another one (or two.)
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker System for a low price
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very good and it works well. I bought it for my granddaughter and she loves it and uses it with her ipod every night.
customer_reviews.author: Gia Gia

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Did not function as described. Would like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Z.

customer_reviews.title: Once synched it is a charm.
customer_reviews.text: very hard to get this to sync with devices. It is not very straight forward. Though once synced it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: This works very well, picking up the blue tooth music. Great sound capabilities. Battery could last longer, but whenever plugged in, it couldn't wsork any better.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Pritt

customer_reviews.title: Great little box with lots of sound
customer_reviews.text: I am truly amazed at the sound quality and how easy this was to set up with my phone, and my pandora account. I can take this anywhere. Runs on batteries or a/c. Very attractive unit.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use w/my Atrix phone. took about a minute to read instructions then pair. Big sound! I'm satisfied with the audio. i also like the aura blu note size and weight. packaged well and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: c ditzler

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good sound but limited range & really uses up batteries! In fact I'm certain drains batteries when off somehow
customer_reviews.author: L&DGonz

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good for a small speaker on the deck but not too much bass for a rich sound. Works well for what it is
customer_reviews.author: rob chernak

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Connect - Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: My tablet speakers sound a little tinny. When I connect with the Spacht BluNote Speaker the sound is quite good. The speaker is small, battery powered or can be plugged in. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this speaker at this price. Good sound comes out especially using the "Stereo Widening" effect which I had not seen on some other Bluetooth speakers I looked at. Easy to pair with my computer and Galaxy. Has a good durable feel. Overall very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GMP

customer_reviews.title: No bass what so ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item thinking it was similar to the Jambox however this speaker has no bass what so ever. I was able to try out the jambox in the store and this speaker sounds nothing like it. After reading all the reviews on amazon and other sites I thought this speaker would be close in sound quality. There is no warm rich sound, it's similar to a cheap $10 double A battery style speaker. The bluetooth and controls on the speaker work great, but no quality sound. I will be returning this speaker and will probably just suck it up and drop the money on a jambox.
customer_reviews.author: Joey M

customer_reviews.title: Decent, for the size
customer_reviews.text: Orchard the BluNote at a deep discount price to Christmas. For the 35 dollar price, it is not bad. There is no way it is worth anything north of 100 dollars.it, on occasion, have difficulty holding a Bluetooth signal, lacks much bass, and has somewhat tinny highs. Then again, it is smaller than I expected and fella like a solid product. Definitely acceptable for $35, not worth anything north of $50.
customer_reviews.author: P. M. McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Suprised
customer_reviews.text: No, it doesn't sound like a Bose or a big speaker system. It is small and very portable. It does produce better and louder sound than I thought. Good product:)
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Sound is incredible as well as range!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this almost 3 years ago with an amazon birthday gift card I received. Still works! I Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Razzle

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit,sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Worked right out of the box, pairing was easy and the sound is excellent for how big it is.I will most likely buy another for my daughter for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Sound is OK, however can't it to play both in another room. It only plays on its own. I was hoping to have this as a second speaker. I'm sure I am doing something wrong. Sound OK nothing great..a little tinny even after I adjust the sound...
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Spracht Aura BluNote
customer_reviews.text: It's ok I guess. Not a waste of money. Add $90.00 and get the TDK A33 It's a WORLD of difference.
customer_reviews.author: instinct

customer_reviews.title: tinny
customer_reviews.text: i really wanted something discrete but with good quality sound. love the design, don't love the sound. i found that my "no-speaker" sound straight from my mac laptop was better or nearly the same. also, i couldn't get the softward downloaded to get the blue tooth to work. hoping to sell back, barely used.
customer_reviews.author: maya

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Tinny sound, I see why it's discounted. Spend your money on a higher quality product. I am not happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: SDMom

customer_reviews.title: Pairs well with Sony Two-Way Bluetooth adapter
customer_reviews.text: Pairs easily with the. I was able to use the Sony to stream audio to this speaker from my TV 20 feet away. Setup was a breeze - it they were working together in about 30 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: This used to be a better product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a version that didn't have the fast forward and rewind a couple years back that had great quality sound. I gave it away and purchased a new one. I'm very disappointed with my new one, the quality of the speakers sound is like music coming from a tin can, it's sound quality is so poor I cringe. Lacks the great sound of the first model. On a good note - the customer service is very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love our new Aura Bluenote. I love the fact I can use it via Bluetooth at the beach or where ever, or we can plug it in at home. We can stream via our phones, netbook or tablet, what's not to like. Sound is good for the level of the device it is. Don't expect Bose quality out of this little dude, but for quick portable music it's a great value.
customer_reviews.author: canczech26

customer_reviews.title: WOW - LEGIT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This device is a game changer in home entertainment. It pairs easily to multiple devices, the sound is amazing for being such a small device, the ease of use is just awesome. I plan on using this device for outdoor BBQ's and entertaining. I will use my cell phone as the remote control and listen to Pandora, Sirius, or MP3s - ALL controlled by my phone - play, pause, volume up or down - truely amazing....Shipping extremely fast too...
customer_reviews.author: Tut

customer_reviews.title: poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Used with my cell phone but treble on my end was poor and people I talked to complained of poor sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: small but loud
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have a few small speakers but this is the best one i have so far thanks
customer_reviews.author: dalia

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice..........
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the sound from this little guy! It paired easily with my iPhone 4 & is so easy to use. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kevinito L.

customer_reviews.title: Only one flaw
customer_reviews.text: It periodically shuts off by itself. Other than that, it has good sound quality and was easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: royboy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Sound is great, love the size makes it easy to take everywhere!!!! For the price, can't believe the power! Recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Cordell

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to have around my house while I do chores. Works exactly as expected. Connected easily to my phone and volume is good. It does distort at high volumes, but that was expected considering I paid so little.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good little speaker
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice little speaker for around the house or even in the yard. It's got a decent amount of volume, but not going bring the house down if you are looking for something for a big party or want to "feel" the base.
customer_reviews.author: Simpleton

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from a small speaker
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth setup was easy and the Spracht provides good sound from a small footprint. The BluNote also is slim so easy to pack.
customer_reviews.author: Griz

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great and it is versatile. You do not need a blue tooth device to hear your favorite tunes. My iPod is from 2007 (old, I know) and it works wonderfully with this item. I would purchase this product again as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Whit

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This blue tooth hooked right up to my iPad without a code or having to set anything. You can't say things work right out of the box anymore and mean it. But, this product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ncmtheather

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I like to bring music when I travel on vacation, and a decent speaker is imperitive. The bluetooth was/is an attactive feature and works fine. However the speakers sound quality was poor for my needs and purpose. I gave the speaker to my son, and continued to use my old bulky boomtube, and will search for something better.
customer_reviews.author: G. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Bass is almost nonexistent and the sound overall is mediocre at best. Save yourself some time and buy the TDK ...
customer_reviews.text: Very mediocre sound quality, definitely not worth the list price of over $100 at all. Bass is almost nonexistent and the sound overall is mediocre at best. Save yourself some time and buy the TDK A33. Worth $30 max.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Small and easy to carry around. Love the blue tooth so I can still use my phone for other things while listening to tunes.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Sound, sound, sound
customer_reviews.text: a nice product. Connect easily to the smart phone (Samsung Galaxy Skyrocket) - the problem - it's sound quality is equal to the smart phone speaker.. Not sure how it got 4 stars.. Supplement - just order the Creative D100 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker. Same price. Great sound. Slightly bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Good sound in a highly portable system
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use with my Asus Transformer tablet and it greatly improves the audio. Runs on 4 AA batteries or included power supply, I would recommend rechargable batteries if you have them. It also works great with my Samsung Galaxy S phone and iPod Touch. For the price you can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: ... the wireless speaker very quick and found it works great.
customer_reviews.text: Received the wireless speaker very quick and found it works great.
customer_reviews.author: WM

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Small Stature
customer_reviews.text: This Bluetooth speaker is compact but puts out what you want to hear. Got one for my sister and she loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma L

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and compack
customer_reviews.text: Small but great sound; I love it. The sound quality is good to have on picnic. and it like having your own personal sound system..............
customer_reviews.author: Tony Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Works, terrible audio quality
customer_reviews.text: This product works as advertised, but with terrible audio quality. The audio is tinny, and frequently it maxes out giving it that clipping effect, distorting everything. It's probably on par with many built-in laptop speakers -- it works in a pinch, but you're not going to enjoy music through it.
customer_reviews.author: nathan__k

customer_reviews.title: Nice Balance of price and Quality
customer_reviews.text: We love listening to music around the house and this is a pretty nice way to do it. Using bluetooth we are able to stream music from our phones to the speakers. Very convenient and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Raymon Soellner

customer_reviews.title: Small Compact and Good sound!
customer_reviews.text: I think I bought this product before the "blutooth speaker" rage. So it was only $12 - 15. Which makes this a STEAL. Even at $20 This little speaker delivers enough sound to fill your living room. The bass boost isn't very dramatic, but the power adapter or 4AA option is nice to have in case you cant plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: Sono

customer_reviews.title: great product for great value
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my purchase, very good sound quality for the price. also battery life is good as well. I am using it almost everyday and so far no issue. I would surely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ritesh S. Dhandha

product_meta.title: Spracht Aura BluNote Portable Wireless Speaker System with Bluetooth Connectivity
product_meta.description:
The Aura BluNote is a portable wireless speaker system, which streams music wirelessly from any Bluetooth device with enhanced sound quality. The Aura BluNote is compact and lightweight, but produces quality sound using features like "bass boost" and "stereo widening" to create a three dimensional soundscape. The BluNote offers a high quality, yet affordable, way to enhance your music experience. Whether you are hosting an event or lounging by the pool, the BluNote is perfect for any occasion. The BluNote allows you to listen to your saved music from your Bluetooth enabled mobile phone, PDA, iPod, MP3/MP4 player, portable game console or computer. Non- Bluetooth devices can connect via an included 3.5mm adapter. Users can pair up to eight different Bluetooth products, which enables BluNote to work with multiple devices. Users streaming music from their phone can make and receive phone calls using the mobile phone hands-free function. The BluNote utilizes Digital Signal Processing (DSP) to provide noise cancellation and convert different audio formats. The Bass Boost produces a rich, deep, bass tone for a more powerful sound. Paired with the Stereo Widening feature, which creates a three dimensional sound, the BluNote is perfect for indoor or outdoor audio activities. The Aura BluNote comes equipped with four AA batteries and an AC adapter. The BluNote can be used within a Bluetooth range of up to 33 feet and provides more than ten hours of audio on battery power.

AMAZON.COM
Listen to your saved music from your Bluetooth-enabled mobile phone, PDA, MP3 player, or portable game console with the Spracht AURA BluNote portable, high quality stereo speaker system. And if your device doesn't include the A2DP Bluetooth stereo music streaming profile, you can still connect it to the AURA via a 3.5mm audio jack. Nicely compact and lightweight, it weighs just 9.5 ounces and measures 7 x 3 x 1.25 inches--perfect for stashing in your bag or backpack for on-the-go tunes. 

 



Stream tunes from your Bluetooth-enabled device to the Spracht AURA BluNote portable wireless speaker system. The AURA Speaker System's bass boost feature provides deep, rich bass tones for a more powerful sound, while the stereo widening feature creates a three-dimensional soundscape. It runs on four AA batteries for up to 10 hours of continuous playback, and it can also be plugged in via the included AC adapter.  Features and Specifications


 * Streams music wirelessly via Bluetooth (requires device with embedded A2DP stereo music streaming Bluetooth profile) 
 * Stores up to 8 Bluetooth profiles so you can pair with multiple devices 
 * DSP (Digital Signal Processing) based noise cancellation 
 * Make and receive calls using the mobile phone hands free function 
 * Bass boost produces a rich, deep, bass tones for a more powerful sound 
 * Stereo widening creates a three-dimensional sound 
 * Battery life: Up to 10 hours from four AA batteries 
 * Audio input jack: 3.5 mm 
 * Speaker output: 2 x 2 watts (4 watts of total power) 
 * Bluetooth range: Up to 33 feet (10 meters) 
 * Controls include volume up/down, bass boost, stereo widening, PTT (push to talk) 
 * Dimensions: 7 x 3 x 1.25 inches 
 * Weight: 9.5 ounces 
 * Backed by a 1-year warranty 

 What's in the Box
AURA BluNote speaker system, AC wall charger, 4 AA batteries, 3.5mm jack to connect to non-Bluetooth devices, user guide, quick start guide
feature_bullets: Wireless, compatible with all Bluetooth/A2DP-enabled devices including iPad, iPhone and new smart Phones/Tablets including Droid, Blackberry, HTC, Samsung Galaxy and many more handsets and computers. Nominated for the CES Innovation Award!

Advanced Audio Distribution Profile (A2DP) for high fidelity wireless audio. The Bass Boost provides deep, rich, bass tones for a powerful sound. Stereo Widening feature creates a 3-dimensional soundscape.

When streaming from your phone, making or receiving calls, use the 'Push-To-Talk' (PTT) Button. Includes a microphone which transforms the BluNote into a 'Conference Phone' allowing you to make/receive calls while you are listening to music.
Works with many computers and can be used as a conference device for SKYPE and other VOIP calls. Stores up to 8 Bluetooth profiles so you can pair with multiple devices.

Runs on 4 'AA' batteries or with an A/C adapter. Inside the box: AURA Bluetooth speaker system, AC wall charger, 4 'AA' batteries, 3.5mm jack to connect to other NON-Bluetooth devices (ipods, mp3/mp4 players), User Guide and Quick Start Guide.
Free iOS Equalizer APP that will increase volume by up to 25%

Wireless, compatible with all Bluetooth/A2DP-enabled devices including iPad, iPhone and new smart Phones/Tablets including Droid, Blackberry, HTC, Samsung Galaxy and many more handsets and computers. Nominated for the CES Innovation Award!

Advanced Audio Distribution Profile (A2DP) for high fidelity wireless audio. The Bass Boost provides deep, rich, bass tones for a powerful sound. Stereo Widening feature creates a 3-dimensional soundscape.

When streaming from your phone, making or receiving calls, use the 'Push-To-Talk' (PTT) Button. Includes a microphone which transforms the BluNote into a 'Conference Phone' allowing you to make/receive calls while you are listening to music.
Works with many computers and can be used as a conference device for SKYPE and other VOIP calls. Stores up to 8 Bluetooth profiles so you can pair with multiple devices.

Runs on 4 'AA' batteries or with an A/C adapter. Inside the box: AURA Bluetooth speaker system, AC wall charger, 4 'AA' batteries, 3.5mm jack to connect to other NON-Bluetooth devices (ipods, mp3/mp4 players), User Guide and Quick Start Guide.
